Content: The Department of Meteorology has said that there is a high possibility of evening thundershowers being experienced in most parts of the island today. There is a high possibility for evening thundershowers over most parts of the island today Fairly heavy falls OF about 75 to 100 mm are likely at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central, North-western and Uva Provinces and in the Galle, Matara, Anuradhapura and Vavuniya Districts. Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and North-central provinces during the morning. The public are called upon to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers. The Met Department meanwhile said that showers or thundershowers will occur in the sea areas extending from Mannar to Matara via Colombo and Galle. Showers or thundershowers will occur at a few places over other sea areas in the evening or night. Winds will be South-easterly or variable in direction and speed will be 10 to 30 kmph in the sea areas around the island.
